Text:
(Oh no, what do I do...she's going to scold me. Of all
people to overhear me, it had to be Lady Alpha...)

You have something you want to ask me, yes?
I am listening.
Y-Yes...umm...
(Urk...the atmosphere is so tense...)

Alpha doesn't look like she is angry, but her quiet
way of speaking can have the opposite effect and
induce fear. Stillâ€”

(Epsilon, you said to yourself, if you get a chance
you have to speak up. There's no need to be scared.)

(It isn't like I want to say something that is wrong,
Lady Alpha is someone who really does listen.)

(When I asked her before it felt like she was dodging
me, but she wasn't especially angry.)

(Right...I will try to say what I want to say...
Again!)

Lady Alpha, please select me for more important
missions. Please!
(What is it?! Why this silence?)
Oh...you said that previously.

You are given missions, aren't you? I entrust you
with Shadow's care, you relay messages within
the Garden, and sometimes gather intel.

To be honest, I think it is because of your great
influence that everyone is keeping the hideout
so clean.
I don't think so!

I-I'm sorry. I didn't mean to shout...but, I don't
mean those kinds of missions.

I was wondering why you have been so flustered.
It's not the Epsilon I know. I have been thinking
about you.
...Really?

Of course. There isn't anyone who isn't needed in
the Shadow Garden.

Everyone is an essential and valuable asset in the
fight against the Cult of Diablos. We are a team.

Though... I probably haven't explained things well
enough, and that has made you feel distrustful.
Please accept my sincere apologies.

I still lack experience, and all of my attention is
focused on expanding the Garden, so I miss
the small details.

Pl-Please don't bow like that! I didn't mean to make
you apologize.

You thought I was being deliberately vague and
dodging you. But, you must see that we need
the right person for the right mission, yes?

I will be sure to speak with you if I have a suitable
mission for you.
Um...is that it?

I said that I will speak with you if I have a suitable
mission. Is there something strange with that?

I don't want to wait for a suitable mission, I want
to do something now! For Shadow!

I want...a more important mission...like combat, or
sneaking deep into enemy territory. I want you to
put me on those kinds of missions. I don't care if
it's a little dangerous!

Why the sudden...even if you think in that way,
it is difficult to just give you a mission right now.

I know I might not have your fighting abilities,
Lady Alpha, or even Delta's. But! I can fight!

I think you know better than anyone else. I train
hard, when it comes to magic control I am peerless.
Naturally, I know that.
Then...!
It's only me...

Beta is not only writing reports as your assistant,
recently she is on the front lines.

Gamma can't help with fighting, but her talent is
managing the Shadow Garden and handling its
finances...that is her real worth.
That is why I am saying...it's only me...
You dislike assisting Shadow?

I am not saying that! But, I want to make a bigger
contribution to the Shadow Garden and Master
Shadow through missions.

(Lady Alpha says I am impatient. But, it isn't that.
I want missions that match my skills. Only that...!)

(This life that Master Shadow saved, it is not just
so I can live a boring, everyday life...)
Hmmm...
(She sighed again...? Am I that annoying?)

Lady Alpha, you are basically saying that I am still
too...inexperienced.
But!

Epsilon, listen. I don't in any way think that your
skills are inferior compared to the others.
Please understand that at least.
Then, why don't you even give me a chance?

Not assigning me with important missions...
Isn't that the same as saying I'm not ready?

Now, don't be unreasonable. I think you have been an
exemplary member of the Garden.
All the more!

If this keeps up, I...I'm afraid I will lose all
confidence in myself. Please...let me prove
myself.
Hmm.. I guess you leave me with no choice.

If this idea is so stuck in your mind, then very well.
I will give you an important mission. It may be life-
threatening. Are you prepared?
O-Of course!

I am ready to give up my life in order to help the
Shadow Garden, to help Master Shadow.
...I see.

(Is it my imagination or does Lady Alpha look a
little sad...?)

Then...I have a mission for you. If you can complete
it, then I will put you on more important missions in
the future.
I promise.
Y-Yes! I will meet your expectations, Lady Alpha!

(Finally, I have a chance to prove myself! I don't
care what the mission is, I will make it a success!)
